```{r}

```

```{r results='hide'}
texas.counties <- counties(48) %>% st_as_sf() %>% st_transform(crs = 3083)
```

```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = st_simplify(texas.counties, 1e4))
```

county_area_water <- get_decennial("county", "AREAWATR", geometry = TRUE, state = 48)
